data.title: Drew's Drama Dames Quiz - Drew Barrymore Characters
data.meta_description: How well do you know Drew Barrymores parts? I will give you the movie and you just have to match it with the name of the character she played in it. This is an adopted quiz. Thanks to Ophelia78 for the original.
data.text: QuestionsChoices 1. E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial Casey Roberts 2. Firestarter Lucy Whitmore 3. Boys on the Side Beverly Donofrio 4. Mad Love Gertie Taylor 5. The Wedding Singer Holly Pulchik 6. Ever After Charlie McGee 7. Never Been Kissed Sophie Fisher 8. Riding in Cars with Boys Julia Sullivan 9. 50 First Dates Danielle De Barbarac
